alligator 0.6.0
===============

:date: 2015-01-01

This was a bugfix release that added Travis CI support & corrected Python 3
errors in the Redis backend.


Features
--------

* Added Travis CI integration for testing. (SHA:`a570391` & SHA:`cef31d3`)


Bugfixes
--------

* Fixed the Python 3 support in the Redis client. (SHA:`d255427` & SHA:`58cdf3c`)
